Product.Name: Striped Mesh Dolman Sweater
Product.Description:
A hot silhouette in an open, ultra-lightweight striped weave that's made for layering. Soft, stylish and easy to pair with a slim skirt or leggings.
  • 100% Spun rayon
  • Wide crew neck
  • Three-quarter length dolman sleeves
  • Open weave
  • Ribbed hem, cuffs and neckline
  • Machine washable
  • Imported

Product.Name: Lurex Exploded Mesh Sweater
Product.Description:
The eye-catching shine of Lurex merges with a sexy open knit in a sweater that will kick up your go-to looks. With its cropped, boxy shape, it'll add contrast and sparkle to the form-fitting shapes of our Ecosil Cami and Ponte Knit bottoms.
  • 100% Spun rayon with Lurex threads
  • Banded open neck
  • Ribbed sleeve cuffs
  • Ribbed hem with side vents
  • Three-quarter length sleeves
  • Machine washable
  • Imported

Product.Name: Marled Sweater
Product.Description:
Play it cool with a season-perfect sweater. Lofty yarns give it a casual vibe that looks great with denim while the va-va-voom shape makes it hot.
  • Open round neckline
  • Three-quarter raglan sleeves
  • Rib trim
  • 60% COTTON/40% ACRYLIC
  • Machine wash
  • Imported

Product.Name: Ombre Stripe Marled Sweater
Product.Description:
Brush off grey days with a sweater in sherbet tones. Lofty cotton yarns give it a casual vibe that looks great with denim while the va-va-voom shape makes it hot.
  • Open round neckline
  • Three-quarter raglan sleeves
  • Rib trim
  • 100% Cotton
  • Machine wash

Product.Description:
A metallic, almost-iridescent lurex gives you built-in spotlight status, even on your casual days. The scoop neck and banded sleeves give this sweater the ideal shape for pairing with your colored denim.

  • Metallic lurex fabric
  • 66% Polyester/34% Metallic
  • Hand wash

Add a hint of printed flair to any outfit with this floral, filigreed cardigan. Warm colors and a dash of cashmere make this a super-soft layer you'll love.

  • Button closure
  • 40% Rayon/13% Nylon/25% Polyester/5% Cashmere
  • Machine washable

Product.Name: Cashmere Blend Deep Drape Sweater
Product.Description:
Luxuriously soft with a plunging draped neckline, this pullover sweater is a layering must. Explore the drama in mixing its boxy shape with the fitted silhouette of a pencil skirt, or our Columnist Pant.
  • 40% Rayon/25% Polyester/13% Nylon/5% Cashmere
  • Oversized drape neck with rolled collar
  • Long sleeves
  • Boxy fit with straight hem
  • Machine washable
  • Imported

Product.Name: Mesh-Stich Lightweight Tunic Sweater
Product.Description:
Metallic-sparked open stitch luxury sweater with a kiss of cashmere. We almost wish it was winter year round, if only so we could don such an ultra soft sweater every day of the year.
  • Bound open neck
  • Elbow-legth doman sleeves
  • Ribbed cuffs and hem
  • 100% Rayon
  • Dry clean

An edgy twist on the buttoned-up cardigan that's brilliant at layering. Our fine knit cotton sweater brings modern polish to every look. Cropped boxy body, ribbed hem with side vents, dropped shoulders. 3-button front.

  • Ribbed hem and cuffs
